meanings.definition: The permanent cessation of menstruation in women.
meanings.sent1: After experiencing menopauses, she no longer had her monthly periods.
meanings.sent2: My grandmother went through menopauses when she was in her fifties.
meanings.sent3: The menopauses made her feel like she was finally free from the inconvenience of menstruation.
meanings.sent4: Her journey through menopauses was like reaching the end of a long and challenging road.
meanings.sent5: The doctor explained that menopauses meant her body was transitioning into a new phase of life.

meanings.definition: The period in a woman's life when this occurs.
meanings.sent1: During her menopauses, she experienced various symptoms like hot flashes.
meanings.sent2: Menopauses can be a challenging time for many women.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her menopauses were like a rollercoaster ride she couldn't get off.
meanings.sent4: As she entered her menopauses, it felt like stepping into a new chapter of her life.
meanings.sent5: The book she read explained menopauses as a natural part of aging for women.
